chapter.title: Access Control service groups management client
chapter.para: The Access Control can be accessed to manage groups with different clients:

listitem.para: A java client, which is described in this guide.

chapter.para: This chapter explains how to download, build and install the Access Control service java command line client to manage groups. The software is java written and requires a java installation.

section.title: Access Control groups management client build
section.screen: cd $MY_WORKING_DIR/ac/cadc-access-control gradle build cd build/distributions/ tar -xvf cadc-access-control-x.y.z.tar

section.title: Access Control groups management client install and configuration
section.para: Check the CLASSPATH variable set in $MY_WORKING_DIR/ac/cadc-access-control/build/distributions/cadc-access-control-x.y.z/bin/cadc-access-control
